channel.title: Retreating
channel.description:
Look im not going to beat around the bush. I want something like rsc pking on my rs2 server. (on my server i got new updated items and stuff) so it will be leet.
I dont know how to go about putting in the 'mob attacker' or the attack logger so you cant retreat before 3 rounds.
I have everything else done (eating and 1v1 no teaming)

item.title: Retreating

Look im not going to beat around the bush. I want something like rsc pking on my rs2 server. (on my server i got new updated items and stuff) so it will be leet.
